markdown:
<title level="1" right="Background " pfs="Standard">[Field Medic](/Backgrounds.aspx?ID=423)</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 86 <sup>2.0</sup>

 

</column>

In the chaotic rush of battle, you learned to adapt to rapidly changing conditions as you administered to battle casualties. You patched up soldiers, guards, or other combatants, and learned a fair amount about the logistics of war.

Choose two attribute boosts. One must be to Constitution
or Wisdom, and one is a free attribute boost.

You're trained in the [Medicine](/Skills.aspx?ID=9) skill, and the [Warfare Lore](/skills/lore) skill. You gain the [Battle Medicine](/Feats.aspx?ID=760) skill feat.
name: Field Medic

text: Field Medic Source Player Core pg. 86 2.0 In the chaotic rush of battle, you learned to adapt to rapidly changing conditions as you administered to battle casualties. You patched up soldiers, guards, or other combatants, and learned a fair amount about the logistics of war. Choose two attribute boosts. One must be to Constitution or Wisdom, and one is a free attribute boost. You're trained in the Medicine skill, and the Warfare Lore skill. You gain the Battle Medicine skill feat.
